summary: MY VEHICLES BATTERY KEEP DRAINING WHEN NOT DROVE FOR TWO DAYS.   I HAVE REPLACED THE BATTERY AND IT STILL WONT FIRE AFTER 2 DAYS.   I SAW THE RECALL ABOUT MOISTURE GETTING INTO THE VEHICLES POSITIVE CRANK CASE VENTILATION VALVE HEATER AND THOUGHT THIS MIGHT BE HAPPENING WITH MY VEHICLE CAUSING MY BATTERY TO BE DRAINED.  HOWEVER, I FIND THAT MY VEHICLE IS NOT ON THE RECALLED LIST.    IT STILL CONTINUES TO DO THIS.
